words.source: H559 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of אָמַר 'to say'; KJV 'said', ESV 'said', NASB 'said'
H4872 (מֹשֶׁה, 'Moses'), proper noun masculine; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Moses'
H6440 prep. l- + noun common masculine plural construct of פָּנִים 'face'; KJV 'before', ESV 'before', NASB 'before'
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H2005 (הֵן, 'behold, if'), interjection; KJV 'Behold', ESV 'behold', NASB 'behold'
H589 (אֲנִי, 'I'), personal pronoun 1cs; KJV 'I am', ESV 'I am', NASB 'I am'
H6189 (עָרֵל, 'uncircumcised'), adjective masculine singular construct; idiomatic for 'unskilled/halting'; KJV 'of uncircumcised lips', ESV 'of uncircumcised lips', NASB 'unskilled in speech'
H8193 noun common feminine dual absolute of שָׂפָה 'lip, speech'; combined with עֲרַל forms the idiom 'uncircumcised of lips' meaning impeded speech; KJV 'lips', ESV 'lips', NASB 'speech'
H349 conj. waw + interrogative adverb (אֵיךְ, 'how?'); KJV 'and how', ESV 'how then', NASB 'how then'
H8085 Qal imperfect 3ms of שָׁמַע 'to hear, listen'; KJV 'shall hearken', ESV 'will listen', NASB 'will listen'
H413 preposition אֶל 'to' + 1cs pronominal suffix; KJV 'unto me', ESV 'to me', NASB 'to me'
H6547 (פַּרְעֹה, 'Pharaoh'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Pharaoh'
